column1: Kata Robata////Kata Robata is such a great sushi place. The only reason I only gave it four stars is it's a little pricey. Their sashimi (especially the salmon) is so fresh and delicious. The sashimi omakase is fabulous
column2: and the lobster mac 'n cheese is also pretty awesome. Everything i've had there has been great though I don't actually remember what else I've eaten there :P Service is generally pretty good.
